name: Michael McBRIDE, Respondent v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner

parties: Michael McBRIDE, Respondent v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of November, 2004, the Petition of Allowance of Appeal is granted and the order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed based on this Court’s decision in Siekierda v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Dep’t of Transp., 860 A.2d 76, 2004 WL 2359860 (Pa. October 20, 2004).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
862 A.2d 585
Michael McBRIDE, Respondent v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 17, 2004.
